    <PropertyValue>// **************************************************
// Custom code for CustShipForm
// Created: 4/29/2019 11:34:08 PM
// **************************************************
//
//	REVISION LOG
//
//	eb1 07/09/19 eric blackwelder @ compudata
//		eliminate error when entering pcid field on summary tab
//	eb2 12/19/19 eric blackwelder @ compudata
//		make faster after entring pcid
//	eb3 01/03/20 eric blackwelder @ compudata
//		change kit ship complete flag
//
// **************************************************

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **

	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		this.epiPCID_tx.AfterEnterEditMode += new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_AfterEnterEditMode);
		this.epiPCID_tx.TextChanged += new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_TextChanged);
		this.epiPCID_tx.Leave += new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_Leave);
		this.epiPCID_tx.KeyDown += new System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_KeyDown);
		this.epiPCID_tx.AfterExitEditMode += new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_AfterExitEditMode);
		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		this.epiPCID_tx.AfterEnterEditMode -= new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_AfterEnterEditMode);
		this.epiPCID_tx.TextChanged -= new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_TextChanged);
		this.epiPCID_tx.Leave -= new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_Leave);
		this.epiPCID_tx.KeyDown -= new System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_KeyDown);
		this.epiPCID_tx.AfterExitEditMode -= new System.EventHandler(this.epiPCID_tx_AfterExitEditMode);
		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal
	}

	{
		// ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
	      
	}

		// ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
	      
	}

		// ** Place Event Handling Code Here **
	}

	private void epiPCID_tx_AfterExitEditMode(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{
		
         EpiDataView edv = (EpiDataView)oTrans.EpiDataViews["ShipHead"];
         Cursor.Current = Cursors.WaitCursor;
         CallDynamicQueryAdapterExecuteByIDMethod( epiPCID_tx.Text);
      	//MessageBox.Show(epiPCID_tx.Text);
		 //eb1:  there is no PCID field on ShipHead
         edv.dataView[edv.Row]["PCID"] = epiPCID_tx.Text;

         Cursor.Current  = Cursors.Default;
         epiPCID_tx.Text="";
		//epiPCID_tx.Focus();
		//epiPCID_tx.Text="";
  		
	}

	private void CallDynamicQueryAdapterExecuteByIDMethod(string PCID)
	{
		try
		{
	
			DynamicQueryAdapter adapterDynamicQuery = new DynamicQueryAdapter(this.oTrans);
			adapterDynamicQuery.BOConnect();
           int OrderNum = 0;
		  
			string BAQName = "GetOrderNum_BAQ";
			Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet ds = new Ice.BO.QueryExecutionDataSet();

			ds.ExecutionParameter.AddExecutionParameterRow("PCID", PCID, "string", false, Guid.Empty, "A");


			// Call Adapter method
			adapterDynamicQuery.ExecuteByID(BAQName, ds);

			// Select all the paint materials and create a quote line for each
			 
				    if (adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows.Count > 0)
					  {
								foreach (DataRow item in adapterDynamicQuery.QueryResults.Tables["Results"].Rows)
								{
								
							    OrderNum = Convert.ToInt32(item["PkgControlItem_OrderNum"]);
								//MessageBox.Show(OrderNum.ToString());
		                        CallSalesOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(OrderNum );
				             
        
	                          }

	                 }
			// Cleanup Adapter Reference
			adapterDynamicQuery.Dispose();

		} catch (System.Exception ex)
		{
			ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
		}
	}


	private void CallSalesOrderAdapterGetDataMethod(int OrderNo)
	{
		try
		{
			// Declare and Initialize EpiDataView Variables
			// Declare and create an instance of the Adapter.
			SalesOrderAdapter adapterSalesOrder = new SalesOrderAdapter(this.oTrans);
			adapterSalesOrder.BOConnect();


			// Call Adapter method
			 System.Data.DataSet dsSalesOrder = adapterSalesOrder.GetData(OrderNo);
             if (dsSalesOrder != null)
				            {
//							//eb2:
//							bool dataModified = false;
				         
				             foreach (DataRow dr in dsSalesOrder.Tables["OrderDtl"].Rows)
				                         
				             {
                                 		                                
					         	dr.BeginEdit(); 

								 //eb3:
					             //dr["KitShipComplete"] = true;
					             dr["KitShipComplete"] = false;

								 dr["KitPricing"] = "P";
					             dr["RowMod"] ="U";
					             dr. EndEdit();

//								//eb2:
                                bool result = adapterSalesOrder.Update();
//								dataModified = true;
		                         
			                 }

/*
							//eb2:
							if(dataModified)
							{
								bool result = adapterSalesOrder.Update();
							}
*/
             
			 
			              }
			// Cleanup Adapter Reference
             //adapterSalesOrder.Update();

			adapterSalesOrder.Dispose();

		} catch (System.Exception ex)
		{
			ExceptionBox.Show(ex);
		}
	}


}
